name: Futuristic Hoverboard Hero
description:
Wanna ride Hoverboard who never gives up the chase? Hoverboard Racer Real Racing Simulator is an Amazing game with lots of real challenging levels for pro gamers! Face new unique challenges in unique environments. Ride your hoverboard through amazing tracks with jumps and loops in this simple and fast-paced physics-based game.Grab your Hover-board and speed your way through the Way! Collect coins, dodge traffic and escape the ferocious Hurdles. Real pros, real gear, real FUN!

Features of Hoverboard Stunts Hero 2016:
•Awesome 3D Graphics
•Real game physics
•Nerve wrecking Hoverboard stunts
•Real-time Hoverboard Stunts experience
•Surreal visual effects
•Realistic Hoverboard Physics and smooth controls
•Choose from 2 control options to suit your riding style
